keyword: calories in a ribeye steak 16 oz
title: Calories in a 16 oz Ribeye Steak
meta_description: Learn calories in a ribeye steak 16 oz, with detailed nutrition facts including protein, fat, carbs, and cooking tweaks for better tracking.
h1: Calories in a 16 oz Ribeye Steak
assumptions: Boneless ribeye steak, choice grade, cooked (grilled or broiled), separable lean and fat, trimmed to 0" fat, no added seasonings or oils.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by grade, cut, fat content, cooking method, and portion size. Values are approximate; consult labels or USDA data when available.

quick_answer.text: A 16 oz cooked ribeye steak provides ~1293 kcal and ~109 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a 16 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 1293 kcal for a cooked choice-grade ribeye steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a 16 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: About 109 g of protein, making it a high-protein option.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Grilling or broiling keeps calories similar; frying adds oil and increases them.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a 16 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Around 95 g total fat, including 41 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are ribeye steaks high in cholesterol?
faqs.a: Yes, a 16 oz serving has ~367 mg cholesterol, mostly from the meat.
